metadata.name: Azure Unusual Authentication Interruption
metadata.comment: Detects when there is a interruption in the authentication process.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (status_id = 50097 AND lower(status_detail) = lower('device authentication is required') OR status_id = 50155 AND lower(status_detail) = lower('deviceauthenticationfailed') OR status_id = 50158 AND lower(status_detail) = lower('externalsecuritychallenge - external security challenge was not satisfied'))

output.summary: Detects when there is a interruption in the authentication process.
